segments.text: Room service.What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is room 504.The room is so cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you turned on the air-conditioner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes.of course . I turned it on half an hour ago . I don't think it work at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , sir.We will send our staff right now .
segments.speaker: S1
